attributes.action: investigate service charges "social landlords" apply to rented properties,considering housing benefit (i.e the tax payer) picks up the bill for services often not provided
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: social landlords i.e former council house stock managers can seamingly dream up service charges, and set a charge they think they will get away with, they are not elected, they ignor any resident complaints and often do not provide any service at all, but they use this charge as a way to backdoor a rent rise and pocket the cash. note . housing benefit pays this charge so tenants on this benefit do not care about the charge. note .social landlords have the majority of tenants on this benefit . this is nothing more than benefit fraud on a vast scale
